column2: "Are you well, are you in trouble? The sixth in the Council of Six Huey is here!"
"Oh right, it's you! Then I didn't have to introduce myself like that did I?"
"It's not like I talk loud like this for no reason, it's to propagate my presence!"
"In battle you can't let yourself be outdone by your opponent! You need to show your fighting spirit!"
"Buff yourself up while scaring your opponent, it's two birds with one stone!"
"My loud mouth is really that annoying? No, there's no way that's true.... really?"
"When I run into other ARKS members, they always run away. I wonder if that's because... No, there's no way."
"Ha! Fufuhaahhaaha! Well then, I'm off! May we meet again!"
